constraints.name: minimum_student_seating
constraints.description: Ensures at least 10 seating positions are available (dining chairs, armchairs, lounge chairs, stools, or sofas with appropriate capacity)

constraints.name: desk_or_table_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that at least one desk or dining table exists for classroom activities

constraints.name: chairs_near_tables
constraints.description: Ensures that seating furniture is positioned within reasonable distance (e.g., 1.5m) of desks or tables for functional use

constraints.name: forward_facing_arrangement
constraints.description: Checks that chairs are oriented towards a common focal point (e.g., front of room where teacher/board would be) with similar rotation angles

constraints.name: adequate_lighting
constraints.description: Ensures at least one ceiling lamp or pendant lamp is present for classroom illumination

constraints.name: storage_furniture_present
constraints.description: Verifies presence of at least one storage unit (bookshelf, cabinet, or shelf) for classroom materials and supplies

constraints.name: uniform_spacing_between_seats
constraints.description: Checks that seating positions maintain relatively consistent spacing (e.g., within 0.5m variance) to create organized rows or arrangements typical of classrooms
